text: Jarkko Nikara driving one of the Pirelli Star Driver cars on the 2009 Rally Finland. Jarkko Nikara (born 28 April 1986) is a Finnish rally driver. He lives in Saarijärvi, Finland. == Career == Nikara started racing at the age of 16 in national autocross competitions. The next year, he participated in Finnish rallysprint races, winning the junior championship. In 2006, he was the Finnish Junior rally champion. The next year, he was second in the national group N championship. In 2009, he participated in six WRC rounds, including his home race, as part of the Pirelli Star Driver competition.Jarkkonikara.com driver profile In 2010, Nikara is racing in the British Rally Championship, driving a Renault Twingo Sport R2.Rallybrc.co.uk drivers registered for the championshipPress release ==Complete WRC results== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !
